UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Discovery, Production and Modification of Five Novel Lantibiotics Using the Promiscuous Nisin Modification Machinery
Literature.Author: van Heel AJ, Kloosterman TG, Montalban-Lopez M, Deng J, Plat A, Baudu B, Hendriks D, Moll GN, Kuipers OP

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus LMG 10147(MIC=68.75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MW2(MIC=68.75µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis LMG 08222(MIC=14.32µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis LMG 16216(MIC=34.38µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium LMG 16003(MIC=4.11µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes LMG 10470(MIC=34.38µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa LMG 6395(MIC=733µg/ml)
